title: District Profile: A Rematch In Illinois' 10th District
teaser: Democratic Congressman Brad Schneider is fighting to keep his job from his Republican challenger, former Congressman Robert Dold.
contentencoded:
In Illinois’ 10th congressional district, Democratic Congressman Brad Schneider is fighting to keep his job from the challenger, Republican Robert Dold, in a race that’s a rematch from 2012, when Dold held the seat and was facing a challenge from Schneider. Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson takes a look at the race with WBEZ’s Katie O’Brien.

Guest

  • Katie O’Brien, reporter and producer for WBEZ in Chicago. She tweets @katieobez.
